title: For Sale - T206 Bill Shipke, Sweet Caporal 350. Beautiful card for 30 bucks!

posts.post_title: For Sale - T206 Bill Shipke, Sweet Caporal 350. Beautiful card for 30 bucks!
posts.post_content:
[url=http://postimg.org/image/6hxkbm2ev/][img]http://s31.postimg.org/6hxkbm2ev/Shipke_Front.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/umy9tbmpj/][img]http://s31.postimg.org/umy9tbmpj/shipkeback.jpg[/img][/url]

A beautiful card with nice contrast and eye appeal. Only blemishes are a small dot on the right hand side of the front and a small amount of paper loss on the back (see scans). I'm asking $30.54 PayPal f+f for this card, delivered in a comfortable bubble mailer and tracking. Let me know if you have any interest by sending a PM or via email here:
[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]

thank you!
